verses.verse: And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6307>Padanaram<s%>, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>; and <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H802>wife<s%> from thence of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and make thee <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, that thou mayest be a <S%H6951>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%>; a multitude: Heb. an assembly of people

And <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to thee, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> with thee; that thou mayest <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein thou art a <S%H4033>stranger<s%>, which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>. wherein: Heb. of thy sojournings

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: and he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6307>Padanaram<s%> unto <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H517>mother<s%>.

When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and sent him <S%H7971>away<s%> to <S%H6307>Padanaram<s%>, to <S%H3947>take<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> from thence; and that as he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him he gave him a <S%H6680>charge<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>;
And that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and was <S%H3212>gone<s%> to <S%H6307>Padanaram<s%>;

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> that the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H5869>pleased<s%> <S%H7451>not<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; pleased: Heb. were evil in the eyes, etc

Then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> unto <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> unto the <S%H802>wives<s%> which he had <S%H4258>Mahalath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebajoth<s%>, to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>. Mahalath: or, Bashemath
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> toward <S%H2771>Haran<s%>. Haran: Gr. Charran

And he <S%H6293>lighted<s%> upon a certain <S%H4725>place<s%>, and tarried there all <S%H3885>night<s%>, because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>set<s%>; and he <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them for his <S%H4763>pillows<s%>, and lay <S%H7901>down<s%> in that <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep<s%>.

And he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>, and behold a <S%H5551>ladder<s%> set <S%H5324>up<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the top of <S%H7218>it<s%> <S%H5060>reached<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and behold the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> and <S%H3381>descending<s%> on it.

And, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> above it, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>: the <S%H776>land<s%> whereon thou <S%H7901>liest<s%>, to thee will I give <S%H5414>it<s%>, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>;

And thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and thou shalt spread <S%H6555>abroad<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and to the <S%H6924>east<s%>, and to the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and to the <S%H5045>south<s%>: and in thee and in thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>. spread: Heb. break forth

And, behold, I am with thee, and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee in all places <S%H834>whither<s%> thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>, and will bring thee <S%H7725>again<s%> into this <S%H127>land<s%>; for I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> thee, <S%H834>until<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to thee of.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3364>awaked<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H403>Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3426>is<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>; and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it not.

And he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, How <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> is this <S%H4725>place<s%>! this is none other but the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and this is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> that he had <S%H7760>put<s%> for his <S%H4763>pillows<s%>, and set it <S%H7760>up<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, and <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon the top of <S%H7218>it<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>: <S%H199>but<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> was called <S%H3870>Luz<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%>. Bethel: that is, The house of God

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If <S%H430>God<s%> will be with me, and will keep <S%H8104>me<s%> in this <S%H1870>way<s%> that I <S%H1980>go<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H899>raiment<s%> to put <S%H3847>on<s%>,
So that I come <S%H7725>again<s%> to my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>; then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be my <S%H430>God<s%>:

And this <S%H68>stone<s%>, which I have <S%H7760>set<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar<s%>, shall be <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: and of all that thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> me I will <S%H6237>surely<s%> give the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> unto thee.
